titleStmt.title: The Frenchmens vvonder, or, The battle of the birds ... to the tune of, In summer time.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Possibly an allegory on the conquest of Franche-Comté by Louis XIV.
Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
